initialMessage.text:
Hey there! Ready to figure out your courses for next semester?

What's been on your mind - any subjects you're excited about or maybe some scheduling preferences?

responses.register: Oh you're ready to register? That's great! Before we jump into that, tell me - what kind of classes are you hoping for?
responses.schedule: Got it, schedule matters! Are you more of a morning person or do you prefer afternoon/evening classes?
responses.prerequisite: Prerequisites can be tricky! Don't worry, I'll make sure any courses I suggest you're eligible for. What subjects interest you most?
responses.gpa: Your grades are looking good! What matters more - keeping that GPA up with easier courses, or challenging yourself a bit?
responses.waitlist: Yeah some popular courses fill up fast! I can help you find good alternatives. What area are you most interested in?
responses.help: I'm here to help you find courses that actually fit! Just chat with me about your interests, schedule, career goals - whatever's on your mind.

suggestedFollowUps: I want to explore new areas

recommendedCourses.name: Advanced Programming & Software Development
recommendedCourses.reason: Great for building practical coding skills with lots of hands-on projects

recommendedCourses.name: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
recommendedCourses.reason: Super relevant for tech careers - challenging but worth it

recommendedCourses.name: Data Science & Analytics
recommendedCourses.reason: Combines coding with real-world data analysis skills

recommendedCourses.name: Engineering Fundamentals & Robotics
recommendedCourses.reason: Hands-on robotics projects - really fun if you like building things

recommendedCourses.name: Advanced Chemistry & Chemical Engineering
recommendedCourses.reason: Registration opens soon - good chance to get in early
